ai-ide-module.check-level-tooltip: The level of depth that the grammar check should cover. 1 is only spelling and basic grammar rules, 2 includes more advanced grammar and syntax, and 3 includes style suggestions and highest-level/formal grammar patterns Default: 3
ai-ide-module.check-mode-tooltip: The mode of the engine during the check. Options are "FULL_CHECK", "QUICK_CHECK", "SPELL_CHECK" and "ADVANCED_SPELL". Default: "FULL_CHECK"
ai-ide-module.info: Enabling this setting takes immediate effect. If development is ongoing, avoid enabling it to prevent potential malfunctions in certain features.

assets-module.info: Assets, including audio and images, are utilized to create a CSV file for batch uploads. Users can copy the asset ID or URL and use it in the CSV for curriculum development batch uploads. First, add all the necessary assets here, then prepare the CSV file using the asset ID or URL, and finally, upload the CSV for batch processing.

attendance-module.add-time-for-live-class: Add Time For Live Class (In Minutes)
attendance-module.add-time-for-live-class-info: If you believe the displayed time is incorrect or if there's an overrun due to forgetting to stop the timer, you can edit the time here.
attendance-module.attendance-operate-info: How the timer operates during attendance tracking?
attendance-module.confirm-verify: Are you sure you want to verify?
attendance-module.info-title: List of rules for the timer in an attendance system:

attendance-tooltip: Attendance is calculated by dividing the number of verified attendance days by the total number of expected attendance days.

calendar-module.bulk-update-info: Verify the dates before updating in bulk. Easily modify both the start and end dates. Remember to click 'Update' for the changes to take effect.
calendar-module.duration-info: You have the flexibility to update the duration for either a single lesson or multiple lessons in bulk
calendar-module.start-date-info: Adjusting the start date will automatically recalculate the end date while maintaining the original duration

calibration-module.info: Kindly choose the users to grant permission for the calibration feature to teachers. Only the selected teachers will be able to access the calibration menu in their accounts.

camera-permission-module.allow-text: This will enable you to participate in video calls and benefit from the Attention System in the student lab.
camera-permission-module.allow-text-2: Our site requires your camera permission for Video call and also use Attention System on student lab.
camera-permission-module.block-text: Our site won't work if you block them. For example, you won't be able to join a video call.

chrome.allow-text: Our site requires your camera permission for video calls and utilizes an Attention System in the student lab. By granting us camera access, you enable us to make full use of these features.
chrome.block-text: Our site won't work if you block them. For example, you won't be able to join a video call.
chrome.note: To give permission for our site to access your camera, you may need to change a Chrome setting. Click on the padlock icon or the "Site permissions" icon and make sure that Camera is set to Allow like in the picture below.

camera-permission-module.dont-allow-text: Opting for this will result in blocking camera permission for our site. However, it's important to note that this will limit your ability to fully utilize the features of our platform. For instance, you will not be able to join video calls.

edge.allow-text: This will enable you to participate in video calls and benefit from the Attention System in the student lab.
edge.block-text: Opting for this will result in blocking camera permission for our site. However, it's important to note that this will limit your ability to fully utilize the features of our platform. For instance, you will not be able to join video calls.
edge.note: To give permission for our site to access your camera, you may need to change a Microsoft Edge setting. Click on the padlock icon or the "Site permissions" icon and make sure that Camera is set to Allow like in the picture below.

firefox.allow-text: Our site requires your camera permission for Video call and also use Attention System on student lab.
firefox.block-text: Our site won't work if you block them. For example, you won't be able to join a video call.
firefox.note: Don't forget to check Remember this decision for remember your choice and don't show this modal again.
firefox.note-2: If you don't see this prompt, you may need to change a Firefox setting. In the address bar, type  and press Enter. Under Permissions, make sure that Camera is set to Allow

camera-permission-module.never-for-website-text: Choosing this option will permanently block camera permission for our site. We recommend avoiding this option unless you have specific privacy concerns.
camera-permission-module.never-message: "Never show again" will disable camera permission and prevent this popup from appearing again. If you would like to enable this feature in the future, you can go to your General Settings.

safari.allow-text: This will enable you to participate in video calls and benefit from the Attention System in the student lab.
safari.dont-allow-text: Opting for this will result in blocking camera permission for our site. However, it's important to note that this will limit your ability to fully utilize the features of our platform. For instance, you will not be able to join video calls.
safari.never-for-website-text: Choosing this option will permanently block camera permission for our site. We recommend avoiding this option unless you have specific privacy concerns.
safari.note: To give permission for our site to access your camera, you may need to change a Safari setting. Under Safari Setting, make sure that Camera is set to Allow like in the picture below.

camera-permission-module.title: Notice for Camera Permission
camera-permission-module.when-choose: When prompted, choose Allow or Block.

chat.delete-message: The message will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.

image-library-module.upload-info: Prepare your CSV file following the sample provided, ensuring no changes to the column names (headers). First, upload all assets individually, and then copy and paste the corresponding asset IDs into the CSV. Subsequently, use this platform to upload the CSV, facilitating the simultaneous addition of multiple image library assets with a single click.

setting-module.activity-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Avtivity Report under Study Skills report.
setting-module.ai: Enabling AI will tutor the bot in the student lab and generate an AI report as feedback just after the student submits an answer.
setting-module.ai-on-feedback: Enabling this feature will allow students to receive AI-generated feedback in Open Ended Lesson activities. This feedback will provide valuable insights and students will be able to see their results in the feedback provided
setting-module.ai-on-speech: Enabling this feature will allow students to receive AI-generated feedback in Speech Lessons. This feedback will provide valuable insights and students will be able to see their results in the feedback provided
setting-module.attendance-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Attendance Report under Study Skills report.
setting-module.attention-system: Enabling the attention feature will allow the system to track the user's attention, keystrokes, and mouse movements.
setting-module.attention-system-off: Attention System has turned off from School level
setting-module.auto-play-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over auto-play options
setting-module.avatar: Enabling the avatar feature will allow you to use cartoon avatar animations.
setting-module.avatar-off: Avatar has turned off from School level
setting-module.badge-bar: Disabling this will hide Badge Bar for Teachers and Students.
setting-module.bagde: Enabling this will hide badge inside the classroom.
setting-module.camera-permission: Some system features require camera access. You can enable or disable camera permissions here. Disabling it means no access to attention tracking, especially for schools
setting-module.chat-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Chat Report under Social Skills report
setting-module.class-test-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Class Test Report
setting-module.code-standards: Disabling this will hide codes and standards inside the classroom.
setting-module.complete-round: By incorporating this addition, it enables the completion of the lesson after a limited number of rounds.
setting-module.copy-paste: Enable/Disable Copy/Paste feature on Problem Statement
setting-module.copy-paste-info: To prevent students from copying and pasting words from the problem statement into the answer input field, you can enable this setting.
setting-module.current-game-setting-info: COUNT_PLAY and RATIO are two types of game delivery types. Ratio games are played in between lesson practice based on the total number of problems and the passed ratio, while count play games are played based on the number of problems solved by the user.
setting-module.current-progress: Enabling this will hide current progress bar inside the classroom.
setting-module.email-notification: Please check if you want to receive notifications on your email.
setting-module.engagement-menu: Disabling this will hide Engagement Menu inside the classroom.
setting-module.font: You can customize fonts for homework and notes in the student lab, and changes will be instantly applied.
setting-module.full-course-progress: Enabling this will hide full course progress bar inside the classroom.
setting-module.game: Enabling the game feature will allow users to play games in all classes of this school.
setting-module.game-off: Game setting has turned off from School level
setting-module.game-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Game report
setting-module.help-video: Disabling this will hide Help Video Button for Teachers and Students.
setting-module.help-video-pop-up: Disabling this will hide Help Video Pop Up inside the classroom.
setting-module.high-score: Disabling this will hide High Score inside the student lab.
setting-module.language-level: Enabling this will hide language level inside the classroom.
setting-module.language-skills-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Language Skills Report under Language Skills report.
setting-module.language-translation-info: Users can translate English to other languages in the student lab. To disable language translation and focus solely on English, you can deactivate it, which will prevent students from translating into other languages.
setting-module.large-font-size: Enabling this feature will increase the font size of the text in the student lab.
setting-module.learning-coach: Enabling this feature will show Learning Coach in student lab
setting-module.lesson-completion-rate-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Lesson Completion Rate under Academic Skills report.
setting-module.live-class-max-time-limit: To prevent unintentional timer overruns in live classrooms, you can set a default maximum duration. In case teacher forget to stop the timer, this limit will help ensure smooth sessions.
setting-module.make-request: Disabling this will hide make request inside the classroom.
setting-module.note: Disabling this will hide note inside the classroom.
setting-module.note-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Note Report under Social Skills report.
setting-module.point: Enabling this will hide point inside the classroom.
setting-module.problem-solving-skills-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Problem Solving Skills under Academic Skills report.
setting-module.proficiency-on-lessons-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Proficiency On Lessons under Academic Skills report.
setting-module.progress-bar: Disabling this will hide Progress Bar inside the student lab.
setting-module.push-notification: Please check if you want to receive notifications on your mobile phone.
setting-module.report-buttons: Disabling this will hide Report Buttons inside the student card.
setting-module.role-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Role Report under Social Skills report
setting-module.rti: Disabling this will hide Real Time Indicators inside the student lab.
setting-module.schedule-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Schedule Report under Study Skills report.
setting-module.school-daily-time: The school's daily time (in hours) represents the expected daily study time that students will allocate in our system for their homework. This value is used to calculate the hours tracked percentage in reports.
setting-module.single-double-course-completion: This will show course completion bar in Single or Double bar inside the classroom.
setting-module.skill-chart: Disabling this will hide skill chart inside the classroom.
setting-module.skip-problem: Enabling this will allow student to skip problem.
setting-module.speech-server-check: Enabling this feature enhances the conversion of speech audio from the server, improving its quality and compatibility with the receiving system. This ensures a smoother and more efficient processing experience, enabling seamless integration of speech data into various applications or workflows
setting-module.speech-tries: Track and Display the number of tries on speech problem
setting-module.speech-writing-conversion: Convert Speech Problems into Writing Problems
setting-module.speech-writing-conversion-info: To allow students to convert speech problems into writing problems when their microphone doesn't work, you can enable this setting.
setting-module.streak-persistence: Disabling this will hide Streak and Persistence inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-dashboard-info: By Selecting this, shool will have control over student dashboard as Simple Landing Page or Classroom Lists
setting-module.student-diary: Disabling this will hide student diary inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-individual-report: Disabling this will hide student note inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-lab: Disabling different fields in student lab
setting-module.student-note: Disabling this will hide student note inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-rubrics: Disabling this will hide student rubrics inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-title-info: Enabling this will hide other students' cards, ensuring authorized students can only view their own information inside the classroom.
setting-module.weekly-time-limit-for-game: Here is a weekly time limit for the game. Exceeding this limit will temporarily restrict access to the game. This helps promote a healthy balance between learning and recreation.
